abstract.t: This document provides a problem statement for simultaneous mobilityin an infrastructure-based mobility environment. It considers whatthe simultaneous mobility problem is and describes the conditionsunder which it may occur. It also illustrates the occurrence of thesimultaneous mobility problem in the context of different mobilityprotocols such as Mobile IPv6. The simultaneous mobility problemdefined here is strictly applied to scenarios when the intermediarynodes in the core are not mobile.
